WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=74929
 
Calculated values from formulas are not stored in xls files that are generated by PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5. This is in contrast to "real" Excel files.
 
Normally this doesn't give problems, but when you open the generated Excel file with an applications that does not feature a calculation engine then you will not see correct values in cells that contain a formula.
 
Apparently Microsoft Office Excel Viewer 2003 [1] is an example of such application. Screen shot example when opening generated Excel file from Tests/14excel5.php
 
http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/6349/ss20091113000925.png
 
Notice the zeros in the "Total" column
 
[1] http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=c8378bf4-996c-4569-b547-75edbd03aaf0&displaylang=EN
 
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.1
WorkItem.Summary: Store calculated values in output by PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

Comments.Message: Fixing this in SVN using wi-10930.patch
